required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Breast Cancer and Quality of Life
clinical_study.official_title: Impact of Breast Cancer on Quality of Life of the Young Women, Her Life Partner and Her Couple

oversight_info.authority: France: Committee for the Protection of Personnes
France: Afssaps - Agence française de sécurité sanitaire des produits de santé (Saint-Denis)

brief_summary.textblock: The study aims to analyse and decode interviews of patient with breast cancer, and then established according a multidimensional profile specific to the population and to create a questionnaire tha will allow a practical and qualitative evaluation of the quality of life.

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Prospective

primary_outcome.measure: quality of life at different time of medical follow up
primary_outcome.time_frame: 6 months after diagnosis, 1 year after diagnosis, between 2 and 7 years after diagnosis, 7 years past diagnosis
primary_outcome.description: interviews with couples at different time frame depending on which group they are in

arm_group.description: 30 couples, interviewed within chemotherapy (6 to 8 months after diagnosis)
30 couples, within herceptin treatment (the first year after diagnosis)
30 couples, within hormonotherapy (between 2 and 7 years after diagnosis)
30 couples, did not received hormonotherapy (1 year after diagnosis)
30 couples, after end of treatments for patients who did received hormonotherapy (7 years after diagnosis)

intervention.description: psychological, emotional, family and social parameters

study_pop.textblock: patient with breast cancer, diagnosed before aged 45, having a life partner

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- age < 45
- non metastatic breast cancer
- at least 6 months of relationship
Exclusion Criteria:
- no life partner
- inclusion criteria failure
